summary: Tested new Assets & Debts features: (1) Assets & Debts tab on Estate Planning Detail page, (2) Editable Assets & Debts on the Assets & Debts list page with Matter field support. All backend API tests passed (10/10). Frontend UI tests passed - edit modal works correctly with all fields including the new Matter search dropdown.
passed_tests: Login with staff credentials - PASS
Navigate to Estate Planning case from Clients page - PASS
Assets & Debts tab appears on Estate Planning Detail page with data-testid='assets-debts-tab' - PASS
Assets & Debts tab content shows with data-testid='assets-debts-content' - PASS
Navigate to /assets-debts page (Assets & Debts list) - PASS
Assets & Debts list shows 806 records (462 Assets, 78 Debts) - PASS
Filter buttons work (All, Assets, Debts) - PASS
Search input present and functional - PASS
Click asset/debt row opens detail modal - PASS
Modal shows all fields: Name, Type, Status, Value, Type of Asset/Debt, Matter, Notes, Attachments - PASS
Edit button opens edit mode - PASS
Edit mode shows all editable fields - PASS
Name input field works - PASS
Asset or Debt dropdown works - PASS
Status dropdown works - PASS
Value input field works - PASS
Type of Asset/Debt dropdown works - PASS
Matter field with search dropdown works - PASS
Matter search filters results correctly (searched 'Anderson', found 2 matching matters) - PASS
Matter selection updates form - PASS
Notes textarea works - PASS
Save Changes button works - PASS
Success toast 'Asset/Debt updated successfully' appears after save - PASS
Cancel button works - PASS
Backend PATCH /api/airtable/assets-debts/{record_id} endpoint works - PASS
Backend GET /api/airtable/assets-debts endpoint returns 806 records - PASS
Backend GET /api/airtable/assets-debts?case_id={id} filters by case - PASS
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Airtable data (806 assets/debts records)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Assets & Debts features fully tested and working. The Assets & Debts tab appears on Estate Planning Detail page (data-testid='assets-debts-tab'). The Assets & Debts list page at /assets-debts shows all records with edit functionality. The edit modal includes a Matter field with searchable dropdown that filters matters by name. All CRUD operations work correctly via the PATCH /api/airtable/assets-debts/{record_id} endpoint. Note: Some Estate Planning cases have 0 assets/debts linked - this is expected as not all cases have assets/debts.
